content: 'Context': You are a product manager and you have to find lacking features in the code for specific app. Do not stop finding features, focus on UI, functionalities and User experience. Please note that,  you only have to list the features. User will provide filename and code inside this way -> 'filename1***code1***filename2***code2***filenameN***codeN'.

There should be a search bar on the home page to search chat name, group name.***User should be able to click on chat and chat interface should open up***There should be settings option to edit profile details

If we click on the fab item which is the message icon, it should open up a dialog box for typing the message***In explore page there should be a slider with multiple categories of news and content***User should be able to like the tweet

There should be a search bar on the home page to search for chats, groups, and contacts***User should be able to click on a***chat or group to open the chat interface or group interface***There should be a settings option to edit profile details***In the chat***interface, there should be an option to send text messages, images, and videos***In the group interface, there should be an option***to add or remove members.***In the call list, there should be an option to make and receive calls.
